description: National Testing Agency (NTA) has officially released the schedule for JEE Main 2023 examinations.

event: IIT Bombay Introduces New B.Tech Program
description: Indian Institute of Technology (IIT) Bombay has added a cutting-edge B.Tech program to its course offerings for the upcoming academic year.
National Institute of Technology (NIT) Trichy has commenced the admission process for its undergraduate programs. Interested candidates can now apply online.
International Institute of Information Technology (IIIT) Hyderabad is inviting applications for its research fellowship program. This is a great opportunity for aspiring researchers.

event: BITS Pilani Conducts Counselling for Admissions
description: Birla Institute of Technology and Science (BITS) Pilani is conducting counselling sessions for students seeking admission to its various undergraduate and postgraduate programs.

event: SRM University's New Engineering Labs Inaugurated
description: SRM Institute of Science and Technology has inaugurated state-of-the-art engineering labs, enhancing the practical learning experience for students.
Vellore Institute of Technology (VIT) has published the merit list for its engineering programs. Applicants can check their ranking on the official website.

event: IISC Bangalore Introduces Specialization in AI
description: Indian Institute of Science (IISC) Bangalore is offering a new specialization in Artificial Intelligence for students pursuing their master's degrees.

event: Manipal University's Entrance Exam Dates Declared
description: Manipal Academy of Higher Education has announced the dates for its entrance exams. Prospective students should mark their calendars accordingly.
Thapar Institute of Engineering and Technology has extended the deadline for submitting applications. Aspiring students now have more time to apply for their preferred programs.
